entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:26 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:13 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
